actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code in order to provide for standards for the enforcement of any maximum speed limit on any public highway required pursuant to Federal law.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Commerce to promulgate standards for State enforcement of any maximum speed limit on any public highway required pursuant to Federal law. (Adds 23 U.S.C. 154)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code in order to provide for standards for the enforcement of any maximum speed limit on any public highway required pursuant to Federal law.
